project.name: SF DBI Data Pipeline Implementation
project.description: Implement Cloudflare Pipelines architecture for SF Department of Building Inspection data to enable real-time ingestion, historical analytics, and enhanced AI agent capabilities for the Renovation Project Manager system.

milestones.name: Phase 1: Pipeline Foundation
milestones.description: Establish core pipeline infrastructure, R2 buckets, and basic data ingestion workflows

planner.name: Project Manager Agent
planner.role: Coordinates pipeline implementation, tracks dependencies, and manages timeline

frontend.name: Frontend Development Agent
frontend.role: Implements dashboard UI, analytics visualizations, and user interfaces

backend.name: Backend Development Agent
backend.role: Implements pipelines, workers, database schema, and API endpoints
